Maps.name: Map Victoria House
Maps.description:
How to install:

  • Download the maps Here.
  • Open File Manager.
  • Extract file.
  • Go to %appdata%.
  • Go to .minecraft/saves folder.
  • If the “saves” folder does not exist you can create one.
  • Drag map folder into it.
  • Start minecraft.
  • Enjoy and play.
